text: 小学校低学年に説教されんなってのほんと / な
translation: Getting lectured by a lower elementary school kid, seriously.
grammar: されんな - Kansai dialect negative command form meaning 'don't get/be ~ed'; ってのほんと - colloquial for 'that's really...'

text: 夜はいいよな / あのうるさいセミが鳴かないから
translation: Nighttime is nice. Those noisy cicadas don't cry.
grammar: よな - casual masculine agreement particle; から - indicates reason/cause

text: 小さい頃は静かでよかったけど毎年増えてる
translation: When I was small it was quiet and nice, but they're increasing every year.
grammar: でよかった - past tense of でいい (was good/nice); てる - contraction of ている (progressive/continuous form)

text: 生態系が戻ってるってミサトさんが言ってた
translation: Misato-san said that the ecosystem is recovering.
grammar: てるって - contraction of ていると (quotative particle); 言ってた - past progressive of 言う

text: うーんミサトさんね / まったく羨ましいよ
translation: Hmm, Misato-san, huh? I'm totally envious.
grammar: ね - particle for confirmation or emphasis; よ - assertion particle

text: あんな綺麗なお姉さんと一緒に住んでて / エヴァンゲリオンを操縦できて / 一度でいいから
translation: Living together with such a beautiful lady, and being able to pilot Evangelion... Just once would be fine, so...
grammar: てて - repetition of て form for listing multiple states/actions; でいいから - 'just/only ~ would be fine, so...'

text: 思いのままにエヴァンゲリオンを操ってみたい / やめたほうがいいよ / お母さんが心配するから
translation: I want to try controlling Evangelion as I please. / You should stop that. / Because your mother would worry.
grammar: てみたい - want to try doing ~; たほうがいい - had better ~, should ~

text: ああそれなら大丈夫 / 俺そういうのいないから
translation: Ah, if that's the case, it's fine. I don't have anyone like that.
grammar: そういうの - 'that kind of thing/person'; いない - 'don't have/exist' (animate)

text: イカリと一緒だよ
translation: Same as Ikari.
grammar: と一緒 - same as ~, together with ~

text: 飯食うだろ
translation: You'll eat, right?
grammar: だろ - casual form of だろう (presumptive/confirmatory)

text: いつもこんなことしてんの / ん?うーん、 / まあな
translation: Do you always do stuff like this? / Hm? Well... / Yeah, pretty much.
grammar: してんの - contraction of しているの (are you doing...?); な - casual affirmative particle

text: ゲリラ戦にでもなった時の / ための訓練
translation: Training for when it becomes guerrilla warfare or something.
grammar: にでもなった - 'even if it becomes ~'; 時のための - 'for the time when ~'

text: こんなおもちゃで何ができるんだよ / 好きでやってるだけさ
translation: What can you even do with toys like this? / I'm just doing it because I like it.
grammar: 何ができるんだよ - 'what can (you) do...?' (rhetorical); 好きでやってる - 'doing because (I) like it'; さ - casual emphatic particle

text: イカリー シンジ君だね / はい / ネルフ保安庁法部のものだ。
translation: Ikari Shinji-kun, right? / Yes. / We're from NERV's Security & Legal Department.
grammar: だね - confirmation particle; のものだ - formal way to say 'we are from ~'

text: 保安条例第8項の適用により、君を本部まで連行する。いいね。 / はい。
translation: By application of Article 8 of the Security Regulations, we will escort you to headquarters. Understood? / Yes.
grammar: により - by means of, due to (formal); いいね - 'understood?, okay?'

text: そんでお前、黙って見てただけやっち / ゅんかい。
translation: And you, you just silently watched, is that it?
grammar: 黙って - te-form of adverb meaning 'silently'; 見てただけ - 'just watched'; やっちゅんかい - Kansai dialect emphatic question

text: なこと言ったって、向こうはネルフの保安庁法部、プロなんだよ。 / それ / がどないしたんや!お前それでもまたんきついとんのか! / やだ、 / えったい。
translation: Even if you say that, they're NERV's Security & Legal Department, they're professionals. / So what! Are you still claiming to be a man despite that! / No way, absolutely not.
grammar: 言ったって - even if you say; どないしたんや - Kansai dialect 'so what?'; それでも - 'even so, despite that'; んか - Kansai question particle

text: 勝てない喧嘩する奴は馬鹿なの / まあ短期は関係ないの
translation: People who pick fights they can't win are idiots. / Well, having a short temper has nothing to do with it.
grammar: 勝てない喧嘩 - 'a fight one can't win'; する奴 - 'person who does ~'; 関係ない - 'has nothing to do with, unrelated'

text: しばらくね / はい / この二日間ほっつけ歩いて気が晴れたかしら / 別に / エヴァのスタンバイできてるわ / 乗る?
translation: It's been a while. / Yes. / Did wandering around for these two days clear your head? / Not really. / The Eva's on standby. / Will you pilot it?

vocabulary.meaning: to feel refreshed, clear one's mind

grammar: ほっつけ歩いて - 'wandering around'; かしら - feminine wondering particle; できてる - 'is ready/done'

text: 乗らないの?
translation: You won't pilot it?
grammar: 乗らないの - negative question seeking confirmation

text: 叱らない / んですね / 家出のこと
translation: You're not going to scold me. About running away from home.
grammar: 叱らないんですね - explanatory のです with confirmation ね; 家出のこと - 'about running away from home'

text: 当然ですよね / 美里さんは他人なんだから
translation: Of course, right? Because Misato-san is just a stranger.
grammar: 当然ですよね - 'of course/naturally, right?'; なんだから - emphatic explanatory 'because ~'

text: もし僕が乗らないって言ったら / 初号機はどうするんですか / レインが乗るでしょうね
translation: If I said I won't pilot it, what would happen to Unit-01? / Rei would pilot it, I suppose.
grammar: って言ったら - 'if I said ~'; どうする - 'what will you do about ~'; でしょうね - presumptive 'probably/I suppose'

text: 乗らないの
translation: You won't pilot it?
grammar: 乗らないの - negative question with explanatory の

text: そんなことできるわけないじゃないですか / 彼女に全部押し付けるなんて / 大丈夫ですよ / 乗りますよ / 乗りたくないの? / そりゃそうでしょ。
translation: There's no way I could do that. Pushing everything onto her... / It's fine. / I'll pilot it. / Don't you want to pilot it? / Well, of course not.
grammar: わけないじゃないですか - 'there's no way, right?'; なんて - 'things like ~' (dismissive); たくない - negative desire

text: 大地、僕には向いてませんよ、そういうの。 / だけど、綾波や美里さんや律子 / さん… / いい加減にしなさいよ! / 人のことなんか関係ないでしょ! / 嫌ならここから出てきなさい!
translation: First off, I'm not suited for that kind of thing. / But, Ayanami and Misato-san and Ritsuko-san... / Enough already! / Other people have nothing to do with it! / If you don't like it, get out of here!
grammar: 向いてません - 'not suited for'; や - listing particle; なんか - dismissive 'something like ~'; でしょ - presumptive seeking agreement; なら - conditional 'if'
